name: Breadefense
description:
It's breakfast time again!

Toast the slices of bread to earn points

Use points to buy guns

Arrow keys to move, mouse to aim/ shoot

R to restart (die)

Weapons:

Flamethrower-Deals decent damage to multiple enemies, but does not have a good range

Coalgun- Shoots red-hot coals that can bounce around and deal low damage multiple times

Popcorn Launcher- Launches a ferociously fast kernel of corn that embeds itself in enemies before exploding, dealing severe damage
